text:
September 13, I960
Mr. Harvey R. Halter
Suite 703-3P Bay Street
Toronto 1, Ontario, Canada
Dear Mr. Halter:
With reference to your letter of September 8 (re Miss Ruth Uusbaum),
this is to advise you that ve are turning this matter over to our
attorneys (Mr. Leonard Marks, of Cohn and Marks, Cafritz Building,
Washington, D. C.).
After further investigation of this matter you will hear further from
us or directly from Mr. Marks.
Sincerely,
Harold 2. Hill
Administrative Vice President
HEHs^l
CC: Mr. Leonard Mirks
Dr. Marshall McLuhan
